title: Like This
lyrics:
Ileohge
Senchihaejineun bam-en seossdaga anj-assda
Jam-i deulgiman-eul gidalyeoyo
Geuleohge
Sigan-i jinamyeon sumgyeo noh-ass-eossdeon

Saeng-gagdeulman-i chaj-aoneyo



Geuttaen wae geulaessji geuttaeui naega

Jigeum-ui nayeossdeolamyeon jogeum-eun pyeonhaess-eoss-eulkka



Hansungando ij-ji moshadeon

Yeojeonhi nae mamsog-e meomuldeon neoleul

Na salanghago issna bwa

Eoje-ui kkumgat-assdeon neol

Na salanghago issna bwa



Eotteohge

Gamseong-e chwihan bam-en saeng-gag-eul olmgyeobwado

Jali jab-aseo kkumjjeogdo an haeyo



Geuttaen wae geulaessji geuttaeui naega

Jigeum-ui nayeossdeolamyeon jogeum-eun naass-eul tende



Hansungando ij-ji moshadeon

Yeojeonhi nae mamsog-e meomuldeon neoleul

Na salanghago issna bwa

Eoje-ui kkumgat-assdeon neol

Na salanghago issna bwa



Wonlae dadeul geuleohdae

Eobs-eojini geujeya andae

Imi jeo meollilo tteonabeolin neoiljilado

Dasi han beon deo nae sonjab-a jullae



Hansungando ij-ji moshadeon



Hansungando ij-ji moshadeon

Yeojeonhi nae mamsog-e meomuldeon neoleul

Na salanghago issna bwa

Eoje-ui kkumgat-assdeon neol

Na salanghago issna bwa



Na salanghago issna bwa

Eoje-ui kkumgat-assdeon neol

Na salanghago issna bwa
